item.title: Data science: House pricing in Belo Horizonte
item.description: The goal of this notes is to have some information on the house prices in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil. The plan is: Clean and visualize the Data in order to obtain some initial information If possible, apply ML algorithms in the data in order to predict the prices Obtain some conclusions in what makes the prices higher. Latitude x Longitude with a mapcolor representing the house price in Belo Horizonte, see more below.

item.title: Data science: Titanic spaceship - Kaggle competition
item.description: The goal of this challenge is find out who is going to be transported or not transported to a new dimension using the train data. Link to the challenge in Kaggle. I’m trying to solve this kagle competition using ML algorithms and some data techinics. This notes are divided in three parts: Data analysis and visualization Try to predict who’s survive in the spaceship accident Conclusions A prediction using ML in order to find out who is going to be transported to another dimension.

item.title: Data science: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
item.description: The goal of this program is to build a wordcloud about some subject of interest. In this particular case I created about Covid, but the reader can easily change the subject. What are twitter users thinking about Covid ? Link to GitHub repository

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Leonardo and I’m a physicist and data scientist. I hold a Bachelor’s and Master’s degree in physics (Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais). As part of my job I started programming and analyze a huge amount of data, and then I begin to research about Data science as well. Right now I’m learning SQL, Machine Learning and cloud computing tools. Here I post things related to physics and data science.
